choices: The two pens to the right
The two pens to the left
1.content: You wake up, dazed and confused. Whatever hit your head really did a number on you. A bright light shines into your eyes, forcing you to shield them and get up. As you look around, you see that the light is the sun. You’re outside, alone, with no idea where you could be. That’s just marvellous. As you look more carefully, you can see a number of barns and stables. You must be on some kind of farm. Maybe if you can find some people you can get help. Where do you go to first?
1.title: A strange new place

11.content: Entering the cow shed, you look around in hope of finding some people. Despite the small flicker of hope inside you, there is no one here except for a number of plump, well fed cows. Judging by the smell of the stable, there might not even be people here at all. As you go to leave, there’s a sign above the door that says “milk Jess before leaving”. Normally you’d ignore the sign, but looking at the size of those cows, it might be a good idea to obey it. What do you do?
11.title: The cow shed

choices: ...Jess' mouth, gaping wide open and dripping saliva on you.
111.content: The sign seemed to suggest that not milking Jess before leaving is ill-advised. So, you decide to go through the cow shed and find Jess. The cows mooed and looked at you as you passed by them. Soon, you come across large pen with the largest cow you'd ever seen. Sure enough, carved on the wooden fence-gate was the name "Jess". Examining the cow, you notice her udders were quite swollen and were in desperate need of milking. Fortunately, beside the gate were two buckets. Taking the two buckets, you entered her pen and sat down on the stool beneath her. You began to slowly squeeze and move the udders as Jess moos in relief. The milking continues as the first bucket is half filled when you feel a sudden shove from her hind legs, kicking you down. As you looked up, you saw...
111.title: Try to find Jess

14.content: With a sigh, you make your way over to the pens to the right. But as you do, you notice another path. The path you're on leads over to the pens, where another one leads to what looks to be a chicken coop. Also faintly heard on the wind is the sound of clucking, confirming the theory that it is a chicken coop. Where do you go?
14.title: The two pens to the right

choices: ...head first with her beak wide open, amazingly engulfing your head
...ass first with her cloaca flying at you
...ass first with her anus flying at you
142.content: It's just a chicken coop, what could go wrong? you think to yourself as you make your way up the gravel path towards the coop. As you approach the coop, the sound of clucking gets louder and louder. You see before you the fairly small door to the coop, locked with a latch. With a simple sweep, you unlatch the door and enter the coop. The coop is neatly organized as the hens sit comfortably on their nests. They eyed you curiously as you entered their domain. Examine the room, you see a very particular hen. On a higher perch was a very large hen, beside her was a sign that read "Big Deborah". Deborah got down from her perch and appraoched you. Thinking she was being friendly, you got onto one knee for her, but she then lurched at you...
142.title: To the chicken coop

choices: The hens ass engulfs your head
The hen let’s you go for something else
1423.content: You gasp in surprise as the giant hen hits you. Or at least you do the closest thing to gasping as your mouth is blocked with the heavy birds asshole. You try desperately to push it off, but it’s no use. This thing wasn’t going anywhere. After nestling into a comfortable position, the hen clucks happily, resting on your face. The smell down there was disgusting as this hen clearly didn’t clean itself after relieving its intestines. What happens to you next?
1423.title: ...ass first with her anus flying at you

choices: Decides to have some different fun
14231.content: Your worst fear is beginning to come true. The hen’s ass widened a little as it let out a giant fart onto your face. You would cough if you could, but the best you can do is to fruitlessly struggle. After the lengthy fart, the hen adjusted itself again, placing its asshole in your mouth before releasing her foul white shit into your mouth. The taste is almost too much for you to bare, and this hen seems to be eating the others judging by how much you were eating. There seems to be no end to this ordeal. Then the hen...
14231.title: The hen starts to shit

15.content: You stretch your legs and then make your way to the pens to the left of you. As you walk closer, you could smell that farm staple scent, manure. The gravel beneath you crunched as you also began to hear snorting and snoring sounds. Ah, these must be the pig pens. you think to yourself as you open the pen and walk inside. As you look around, you cold see many large, rotund pigs feeding on their cornmeal. But, there are two that notice you come in. Both pigs were bigger than the rest of them, both in height and width. One was a female with huge breasts, ready to burst, and the the other was a male with a massive pig cock...
15.title: The two pens to the left

info.brief_description: This is my first interactive story. Hope you enjoy ^^
info.description:
Ok, so this is the first interactive I’ve ever made. Apologies if it’s not great. The theme is the main character (you) waking up on a strange farm you have never seen before. There are no people, just some overly friendly animals
Some rules:
I will allow any animals that belong on a farm (pigs, cows, horses, donkeys, chickens etc) but no mythical animals like dragons or werewolves, and no making the animals talk. I will have a separate story for that. All themes are allowed, and gross stuff is heavily encouraged. Last thing, I don’t want any weak entries that are only three lines long. I want each one to be as detailed as possible please. Any weak entries will be deleted.
But enough of my ranting, please enjoy the story ^^
